Title: The Cooler
Actors: William H. Macy, Alec Baldwin, Maria Bello, Shawn Hatosy
Plot: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss' consternation.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 25 nominations.
Production: Pierce-Williams, ContentFilm, Gryphon Films, Furst Films, Visionbox Pictures, Dog Pond Films
